lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton has not announced whether she's running for president in 2016. But when she and the road show that inevitably follows her arrived at the University of Miami, an official declaration seemed a mere formality.

headline.main: As Hillary Clinton Soars, Questions Shadow Lucrative Speaking Tour
headline.print_headline: As Hillary Clinton Soars, Questions Shadow Lucrative Speaking Tour
